mapper.insert: insert into `app_category` (categoryCode, categoryName, parentId, createdBy, creationTime, modifyBy, modifyDate) values (#{categoryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{creationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update `app_category` set categoryCode = #{categoryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, categoryName = #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parentId = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, createdBy = #{createdBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, creationTime = #{creationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifyBy = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modifyDate = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, categoryCode, categoryName, parentId, createdBy, creationTime, modifyBy, modifyDate from `app_category` where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, categoryCode, categoryName, parentId, createdBy, creationTime, modifyBy, modifyDate from `app_category`
